io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base

Class TransformationBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<I>,I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<O>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.TransformationBasedSampler<S,I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of sampler providing the input
    I - type of input
    O - type of transformed output
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<O>, CanCache, Sampler<O>, TransformingSampler<S,I,O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllPagesForTemplateSampler, CountingSampler, JsonSampler, JsoupElementBasedSampler, RegexBasedSampler, SplittingSampler

    public abstract class TransformationBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<I>,I,O>
extends CachingBasedSampler<O>
implements TransformingSampler<S,I,O>
    Abstract base class for transforming samplers.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransformationBasedSampler

        public TransformationBasedSampler()
        Transformation based samplers need an input sampler to operate. Using this constructor requires input to be configured via setter before sampling.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • TransformationBasedSampler
